item.title: Nahamcon CTF 2022
item.description: THE COMPETITION ORGANIZED BY JOHN HAMMOND WITH MANY SPONSORS CHALLENGES JOHNKS Name Points Authored By johnks 500 birch#9901 Description This is Forensic challenge solution i downloaded a png file and i can see a john Hammond pic and some stock values but the discription saying “Rising rising in height” so what if i increase the height of picture? using tweak png to edit image height then boom!!! we get flag
